description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React and ReactDOM libraries, applies global CSS styles, imports the main App component, creates a React root element, and renders the App component within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root DOM node.
